body_html:
It looks like it is just the cuda initialization that crashes.
Can you run the cuda samples properly?
Do you have cuda version matching for your pytorch install and the one on your system?
Can you run import torch and torch.cuda.FloatTensor([1]) ?
body_text:
It looks like it is just the cuda initialization that crashes.
Can you run the cuda samples properly?
Do you have cuda version matching for your pytorch install and the one on your system?
Can you run import torch and torch.cuda.FloatTensor([1]) ?
body:
It looks like it is just the cuda initialization that crashes.
Can you run the cuda samples properly?
Do you have cuda version matching for your pytorch install and the one on your system?
Can you run `import torch` and `torch.cuda.FloatTensor([1])` ?
